name: neep
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a round root vegetable with dark yellow flesh and a brown or purple skin: A tractor carrying neeps had careered into a ditch. She gave me a large plate of mince, tatties (= potatoes), and neeps, and it was magnificent. Synonym
swede
More examplesFewer examplesEveryone's eating haggis, neeps, and tatties, followed by a selection of Scottish cheeses.Bashed neeps are one of the most famous of our vegetable dishes.Dice a neep and one large carrot.
